item.title: Buckets by the Loaf: Pricing for Everyone
item.description: For some of you, a Buckets license costs more than an entire month’s salary! Paying so much for an application that’s designed to help you save money doesn’t make much sense. To address this, we’re pleased to announce a small experiment we’ll be running over the next few months: Buckets by the Loaf.

item.title: Launching the 2019 Buckets Community Survey
item.description: We’re pleased to announce our second annual Buckets Community Survey! Whether you use Buckets or not, your feedback will help us understand Buckets' strengths and weaknesses, get to know who’s using it and help determine where we go in the future.

item.title: Buckets Mobile Alpha Testers
item.description: Long time no blog! A summer of changes has ended, with the biggest change being that we drove across the United States to our new company headquarters. They weren’t kidding; Iowa has a lot of corn fields. While the move has been a very fun, time-consuming and exciting adventure for our family, you’re probably more excited to hear about the Buckets mobile app.
